Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg'}
{1: '01: Secret Base'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When you burst into the library where Noan is, the Babylonia sky has already transitioned into the hues of night.'}
{3: 'You got caught red-handed by Celica while you were negotiating with a merchant on the roadside because your year-end summary report was late for three whole days.'}
{2: 'Noan! I need to take shelter here!', 3: '9'}
{3: "Without question, Noan immediately steps aside, gesturing toward a corner of the library's beverage bar."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: '(Hide under the bar counter)', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Call me after Celica has gone far enough...', 3: '14'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "This place might not be safe if it's Celica.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory595.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory595.jpg'}
{3: 'He pushes open the narrow door to the storage room behind the bar and opens the box deep inside.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Hide in here.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg', 2: '2'}
{3: "As anticipated, Celica's voice soon echoes through the library."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Have you seen 【kuroname】?', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Her footsteps echo throughout the library, searching the bar counter just as Noan anticipated.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "【kuroname】, no matter how many missions you have on your plate, that report can't be delayed any longer. After all, it needs to be presented at the Parliament.", 4: '18'}
{2: "(But it's really long!)", 3: '37'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '【kuroname】? If you come out now, you still have a chance to finish it in the battle preparation room.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "But if I find you... you'll have to complete it alone in a meeting room inaccessible even to Gray Raven.", 4: '18'}
{3: 'After circling the library twice, Celica sighs—then, the familiar sound of an emergency terminal call rings.'}
{3: 'But... your terminal is not with you?!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "Seems like the commandant left it here... I'll return it later.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'How could the commandant possibly leave the terminal here?', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "Here's the thing...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Their voices begin to fade, drowned by the clamor of the bustling crowd beyond.'}
{2: '...', 3: '53', 4: '(What are they talking about?)', 5: '53'}
{3: "Ten minutes later, Celica's footsteps finally peter out."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory595.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A crack in the box reveals Noan standing there, a smile gracing his face.'}
{2: 'Is it safe now?', 3: '60'}
{2: "...Indeed, I'm not done with the report yet.", 3: '62'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "It's not just that—but I've bought you some time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Let me lend a hand with that report before they catch you here, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
